# z-table


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

ZTable component.

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `bordered` | `bordered` | Whether the table cells should show a border between them. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                              |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | Table content (`z-thead`, `z-tbody`, `z-tfoot`, `z-tr`). |
